data.note: There is no specific budget for rural electrification. Programmes are scattered between multiple foreign donors and multilateral institutions such as the African Development Bank and World Bank.
data.name: Rural electrification budget

data.note: This is the estimated cost per customer of connecting 225,000 customers around the urban area of Kinshasa, which is budgeted at a total of $127m. With an electrification rate of only 9%, the vast majority of the population lives in an area that is far removed from the nearest grid connection. Therefore, the average cost to connect the entire population would be significantly higher.
data.name: New connection cost
